applications.author: astosia

changelog.release_notes: fixed hour digit scaling on Chalk/Time Round
Added Emery/Pebble Time 2 support.   Lots of code optimisation & clean up.
Updated Weather Options in setting to display some or all of 1) Sunset/Sunrise time & moonphase, 2) Current Weather, and 3) Forecast Weather.
Added Open-Meteo weather provider.  Updated weather icons to make more consistent
fixed config screen to remove pmkey
Updated Weather to work with Openweathermap OneCall API v3.0.  You will need to subscribe for a key, and limit calls to 1000 per day to avoid being charged.

Added option to shake/tap watch to show current weather conditions (requires OpenWeatherMap or DarkSky api key).
  Changed behaviour of Hour digits to shrink down when timelime quickview is visible (all watches except PTR).

Changed steps colour options, added option to switch off steps to remove the annoying banner if you don't have Pebble Health switched on, changed behaviour of Hours when timeline quickview appears.  
Added in option for manual lat/long for sunset/sunrise times.
Initial Release

applications.description:
Phoenix Big is a customisable, easy to read, large font watchface using the Steelfish font.  Shows optional weather, sunset/sunrise and steps

Features:
- Auto-detection of 12h/24h based on your watch settings
- Auto-translation of weekday supported for:
 English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Italian.
- Day & Date and Battery complications
- Optional display of Sunrise/Sunset time based on your current location (uses Suncalc, based on latitude/longitude from your phone's gps) - on by default, switch off in settings
- Moonphase
- Step count (Time Series & Pebble 2 watches) - on Time Series, shows in Green if you are above your average step count, red if you are below.
- Hour digits to shrink down when timelime quickview is visible (except PTR).

Optional Weather uses Open-Meteo by default, does not require an API key.  If you prefer, you can switch to OpenWeatherMap 3.0, which does need an api key and subscription: there is a free tier.  Select in settings whether to show current and/or forecast weather.  Shake/Tap to change views:
- Current weather shows conditions icon and current temperature
- Forecast weather shows conditions icon and daily high|low temperature

Options:
- Choose background and text colours 
- Bluetooth disconnect vibration warning and icon (no vibe in quiet time)
- Quiet Time icon
- Optional night theme colours between sunset and sunrise

latest_release.release_notes: fixed hour digit scaling on Chalk/Time Round

applications.title: Phoenix Big

applications.author: sesio

changelog.release_notes: Bugfix: Support new Google Calendar ID length

A slow internet connection no longer disables GET calls.
This bug caused custom variables not to update and resulted in misleading dashboard values.

- Any Cockpit now supports iOS 15+
- Added new Online Themes
- Some bug fixes

Check out the new Themes:
https://derivat3.github.io/pebble-watchface-any-cockpit/themes/

- You can now use RegEx to process XHR Responses
- Theme names are now handled and persisted
- Color handling of the random generator optimized
- Behavior of the content type hidden updated
- Handling of dashboard boolean values updated

Check out the new Themes:
https://derivat3.github.io/pebble-watchface-any-cockpit/themes/

Changelog
- Enable up to 10 dashboard elements
- Enable dashboard element alarm vibrations
- Added dashboard element alarm type 'Message'
- Added new dashboard element orientation types
- Added adjustment slider for dashboard elements
- Added new Dashboard element types
- Some bug fixes

Changelog
- Added online settings menu as fallback
- Small menu is replaced by online settings menu
- Custom Values are saved for each memory slot
- Optimized import of online Themes
- Fixed a bug in the ISO calendar week calculation

Changelog
- Optimized the XHR result handling for usability
- Fix missing screenshots
- Other bug fixes

Changelog
- Introduced the dashboard type: State
- Enabled the dashboard types: Chart
- Fix the dashboard alerts: Value, Star and Flash

Changelog
- New notification style for rectangular pebbles
- Add crash report to notify about small settings menu
- Renamed watchface
- Fix some bugs

Changelog
- Bug fixes and updates in the settings menu

Changelog
- Response Selectors can handle OR conditions
- Introduced Themes Page for many new designs
Initial Release

applications.description:
Any Cockpit is the evolution of its little brother Arc Calendar. Besides the calendar feature this watchface offers now the possibility to address any public API to fetch data via GET Requests and display them as dashboard elements.

Your pebble is now flexible enough to solve a wide variety of needs with different watch faces for different purposes which also can be exported, shared and imported.

Despite all this convenient features like API calls or import and export there is no external service or companion app involved.

Benefits
- Highly configurable watchface
- Fetch data via GET Requests, Lodash and RegEx
- Add & configure up to 10 dashboard elements
- Trigger alerts by 'Custom Values'
- Use google calendar in circular manner
- Get notified about your next appointment
- Backup and share your personal clock face
- Simply import newly added Online Themes
- 10 clock face presets
- Memory slots for 10 custom clock faces
- Configurable random generator

New Highlights
- You can now use RegEx to process XHR Responses
- Theme names are now handled and persisted
- Any Cockpit now supports iOS 15+

latest_release.release_notes: Bugfix: Support new Google Calendar ID length

applications.title: Any Cockpit

applications.author: Morris

changelog.release_notes:
Added config option to show heart rate for watches with HRM
Row option: Active time | Heart rate

- added support for Timeline Quick View
- added support for Pebble 2

new features:
* show Pebble Health data on PT,PTS,PTR (steps, distance, activity)
* show temperature | seconds
* new "heart" character
* new highlight options two/three columns (color Pebbles only)
* improved battery life by limiting accesses to the permanent storage

bugfixes:
* improved memory usage on Aplite to prevent a possible crash
Fixed some bugs with "Skip splash screen" and "No animation" options (thanks to Joseph for reporting this!)

* added option to display "Calendar week | seconds" row (second ticks are not animated but will drain your battery faster)
* prevent screen updates if the Watchface is not in focus

* Added Pebble Time Round support
* Fixed battery level percent display on rows showing Battery level | Calender week

new options:
* show battery level in percent
* hide the serif of the 5 to increase readability
* new row option: Calendar week | weekday number
* new row option: Empty row
* adjust the custom time zones to daylight saving time automatically

improvements:
* better temperature conversion to improve accuracy of Fahrenheit
* single color black/white highlight automatically invert the text as needed
* temperature is displayed in 3 digits if necessary and if there is enough room
* if the third temperature digit is truncated this is indicated in the hints display

bug fixes:
* a smooth gradient from and to the same color now works
* fixed boxed highlight inversion
Added option to show "Month | Short year" to complement "Weekday name | day" date format.

new options:
* use a larger font
* display time in two additional custom time zones
* override the time format set in the watch settings
* display date with weekday name or number
* display hints permanently
* new highlight options for Pebble Time (gradients and stripes using 3 colors)

improvements:
* more character options for the splash screen
* hide hints during animations
* don't invert black and white highlight colors

bugfixes:
* fixed crash occurring on original Pebbles during "Long animation" tapping effect
Added Rainbow highlight option.

* Added more color highlight options (Pebble Time only)
* Added option to disable animations during a custom time period

* Added option to display Zulu time (UTC always in 24h format)
* Added option to display time in GMT (UTC in 12h/24h setting)
* Added longer double vibration option (Halfbeat)
* Added different invert option (everything, without highlight row, highlight row only)
* Added option to skip the splash screen at startup
* Added option to show the splash screen when tapping the watch
* Added SPACE as a valid character to display on the splash screen
* Added option to disable animation when BT is disconnected

* Only vibrate once to indicate BT disconnect instead of on every start.
* Vibrate for reconnection even if the Watchface was not active when the reconnect occurred
* Added option to show temperature in Celsius and Fahrenheit next to each other in one line

* Added options:
  - Vibrate on BT re-connect
  - Configure every vibration type (short, long, double, heartbeat)
  - Longer animation on tapping the watch
  - Invert the screen (permanently or on BT connection loss)
  - Track the Pebble Appstore Hearts of a Pebble App or Watchface
  - Configure the animation style (ease in, ease out, ease in and out, linear)
  - Enable a "No vibration" schedule
  - Disable all vibrations while charging
* Some extended options are only shown on request on the configuration page
* Performance and memory usage improvements on monochrome Pebbles
* Some minor bug fixes
Added workaround for JavaScript exception in 3.0 firmware.

* Made temperature update and caching intervals configurable
* Improvements on temperature update mechanism
Added more options to limit animations (disabled except for startup and/or tapping animation)

* Fixed Watchface running amok and crashing when all rows are set to random [who does that anyway? ;)]
* Fixed screen not returning to normal after scrambling when animations are disabled
* Added tapping effect: Animation
* Added monochrome highlight option: Dark Gray

* Improved performance on monochrome Pebbles
* Changed display of temperatures in Fahrenheit (it's now the same as for Celsius, always 2 digits except for temps < -9)
Fixed issue with settings page not opening on iPhones.

applications.description:
Inspired by the Enigma Watchface shown during the Pebble Time Kickstarter campaign, I created my own version and added some twists of my own and lots of customization options. Works on Pebbles with color and monochrome displays.

All credit for the original design to the designer and the developer of the Enigma Watchface, Alex Kirov and Neal Patel.

Configurable options:
* Font size
* Highlight colors and style
* Invert the screen
* Five lines of data
* Splash screen
* Choose from:
  - Time (local and custom time zones)
  - Date
  - Random digits
  - Temperature (provided by OpenWeatherMap.org)
  - Watch battery level
  - Calendar week
  - Splash screen string
  - Pebble Appstore Hearts (provided by PblWeb.com)
  - Seconds
  - Pebble Health data
* Limit animations to conserve battery life
* Animation speed and style
* Tapping effects: Scramble, Display help, Animations, Show splash screen
* Display help permanently
* Time and Date format
* Temperature unit
* Fixed weather location or GPS
* Temperature update intervals
* Bluetooth connection loss and reconnection alert
* Low battery level alert
* Hourly vibration
* No vibration while charging
* No vibration/animation schedule
* Different vibration patterns

Please contact me for bug reports, questions or feature requests.

Please remember to "heart" the Watchface if you like it. Thanks!

latest_release.release_notes:
Added config option to show heart rate for watches with HRM
Row option: Active time | Heart rate

applications.description:
Take a trip to the stars with this Starfield-inspired watchface.

It works best for the Pebble Time Round.

Features
- Time Display: Large, easy-to-read time with day, date, and AM/PM indicators
- Step Tracker: Visual arc or lines display showing daily step progress with customizable goal
- Battery Indicator: Real-time battery level display
- Second Ticker: Optional animated second indicator (can be hidden via settings)
- Splash Screen: Customizable startup logo (several options or none)
- Multi-Platform: Supports all Pebble watches (Aplite, Basalt, Chalk, Diorite, Emery, Flint)

applications.author: irek

changelog.release_notes: Make text placeholders case insensitive where possible
New icon
Recreate watchface from scratch. Port text features from Jealous watchface including weather.

Add more keywords to watchface metadata like "seconds". Recently reading reddit/r/pebble I learned that people are trying to find watchfaces with support for seconds and there are not that many. Someone suggested to search using "seconds" keyword.
Always display leading zero in shadow of hours even when leading zero is hidden.
Fix steps counter
Fix issue with timer cleanup on Aplite

Add new setting to control how seconds are updated. @computernoobe on Reddit [1] had an interesting real life scenario which required watchface to support seconds. Brutal had seconds but only on Tap for 5 seconds. With this update it's possible to disable seconds, enable seconds or enable seconds on Tap for defined amount of time.

[1] https://old.reddit.com/r/pebble/comments/1ortzc4/watchface_recommendations_w_seconds_counter/

Support spread character (comma ',') in Bottom and Side texts. It divides text into two parts spreading them around with spaces as much as possible. For example this can enable you to display date in the bottom left corner and seconds in bottom right corner. I added documentation for this to settings page with one new example for Bottom and Side texts. Feature is not available for Pebble Time Round as spreading text there makes no sense and makes it very ugly.
Support Emery platform
Update bottom and side layer on Tap without waiting.
Update bottom and side text on "tap" (AKA shake) for 5 seconds. This allows to display %S (seconds) in bottom and side text without draining the battery. Implemented for @agave_garden.
Support Pebble Time Round
Display battery charge percent in bottom or side text.
Fix issue with settings on Aplite. Error was caused by resource image taking too much space. Gib font is now drawn on he fly from smaller pieces.

- Add shadow effect to hours and minutes
- Show leading zero in hours by default
Add icon

- Toggle displaying of leading zero in hours
- Add background to small hours when Quick View is active
- Decrease strength of dithering effect on hours big numbers when Quick View is active
- Hopefully fix issue with settings page for aplite target

- Big digital time 12h/24h
- Customizable bottom line for date or any other text
- Customizable side line with tiny text for extra info
- Compatible with Quick View (popup)
- Custom colors
- Vibrations on Bluetooth connect/disconnect
- Possible vibration on each hour

applications.description:
Basic watchface with big time made with custom fonts resembling huge buildings of brutalist architecture.
Created during Rebble Hackathon #002.

- Big digital time 12h/24h
- Customizable text lines
- Battery, connection, quiet time status
- Weather, health and icons
- Compatible with Quick View (popup)
- Custom colors
- Vibrations on Bluetooth connect/disconnect
- Possible vibration on each hour
- Toggle displaying of leading zero in hours
- Adjust shadow effect for big numbers
- Disable/enable seconds or enable seconds on Tap for some amount of time

Click on "Website Link" below to learn about BRUTAL design.

applications.description:
An analog-digital watchface featuring the solar day, created for Rebble Hackathon 002!

Halcyon represents the 24 hours of the day as a ring around the edges of your watch, highlighting the sunrise, sunset, and the position of the sun itself!

Inspired by the PebbleOS 3.9-era sleep visualization! (does anyone remember that?)

Features:
* Watch the hours of your day slip away as the sun moves through the 24-hour outer dial
* Select from 10 different exciting color presets
* An absolutely unreasonable amount of color customization! (14 different colors you can customize!)
* Live color theme previews on the settings page!
* No internet connection required! As long as the watchface has communicated with the phone at least once, Halcyon calculates the sunrise and sunset on-device.

Known issues:
 - The secondary text setting does not currently do anything because secondary text isn't implemented yet
 - Needs more cool and exciting features

latest_release.release_notes:
v1.6
- Large font size setting! Experience the a whole new world of a slightly larger font
- Time 2 support, so that when you get your preproduction Core Time 2 dev board you'll be all set

add CaiYunApp weather data source for China,
more accurately, but only for 48 hours forecast.

ready for DIORITE platform

applications.description:
Show you what weather is going on in the future.

Request to update weather hourly and keep the 5 day / 3 hour forecast data. Therefore you can see the change of weather oncoming.  
 
You can set one reminder and show it as line on the timeline of weather wave. while on start or end, the watch will buzz to remind you. 

V1.7 above, is ready to synchronize with AndroidPhone's system calendar, and show Two Schedules as the reminder line on the weather timeline.
You need to download the Companion App(widget) and sideinstall it. Load the widget and reset your phone, and then enjoy this watch face.
The widget will synchronize periodly automaticly, or manually by pressing the analogclock included.


The weather and max/min temperature on top screen is the forecast data for tomorrow (and the day after).
Below that, is the start time of next reminder or schedule if you have.


The Companion App :WW widget 1.3 :
http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=3759337882&uk=3422589443
applications.title: Weather Wave

applications.description:
First Release:
Clean watchface with 3 week calendar.
Displays in 12 or 24 hour depending on your watch settings.
Built for myself but also in support of democracy. If you would like to help fix democracy in the US check DemDuck.org for what you can do to help!

Supports:
- Original Pebble
- Pebble Steel
- Pebble Time/Steel
- Pebble 2/Duo
- Pebble Time Round
- Pebble Time 2 (I don't own this watch yet, so let me know if you have any issues)
- Pebble Round 2 (it should support the zoom, once dev support comes, I hope to make it native)

- For Time Round, the calendar is shifted to the middle to show the most calendar possible
- There is a status tab (on bottom of the calendar for round and top for all others) that shows battery, Bluetooth when disconnected, Silent mode when enabled.
- Shows as black and white regardless of the watch for better visibility.

Unfortunately, real-time data is not currently available for stocks (it is always day old). Feature suggestions are welcome on the GitHub page for this project. This project was funded in part by a Rebble grant. Thanks Rebble Alliance!

changelog.release_notes: Store chronograph value in persistent storage
First release with most of the features but missing support for all platforms

applications.description:
Big abstract looking numbers with rounded features and 4 lines of customizable text.

In comparison to Brutal (my previous watchface) this tries to take itself less seriously, look artistic and have more features. Rounded shapes should match round features of Pebble 2 Duo watch case. It's an naive attempt to make Brutal successor.

Features:
- Digital time (24h/12h) with optional seconds
- Customize colors
- 4 lines of text with customizable content and icons
- Steps counter, battery level, connection status and more
- Simple chronograph, idea stolen from Analogue Dots by Flo Knödl
- Quick View support
- Vibration settings on each hour and Bluetooth status
- Blob (^^ )

The Blob, also known as Blobby is a little naive creature that lives inside this watchface. It's emotionally unstable and will change his mood each minute or based on Pebble status like Bluetooth connection or battery level.

TODO:
- Support Pebble Time Round
- Support Pebble Time 2
- Maybe hearth rate and sleep statistics
- Maybe weather

applications.author: Freakified

changelog.release_notes:
Release Notes:
v7.7 ("Forgotten Memories of Another Time")
- Fix: Alternate time zone widget no longer resets back to GMT after exiting watchface
- Fix: Should be less likely to delete all your settings during upgrades in the future
- Improvement: Alternate time zone settings page now provides a reminder about the potential impact of daylight savings time

v7.6 ("Bugs are a part of life")
- Fix: Settings page no longer half-disappears if you unselect the weather widget
- Fix: UV index widget can now display values other than 4

v7.5 ("Risen From The Grave")
- New feature: UV Index widget, allowing you to determine precisely how much of a problem it is that you forgot to put on sunscreen
- Improvement: Swatch™ Internet Time widget is now available for classic Pebbles, allowing OG users to finally know what time it is on the internet
- Improvement: Alternate Time Zone widget now supports selecting a time zone instead of using a confusing hourly offset (thanks FlynnD273!)
- Improvement: The sleep widget has been restored and is now selectable as independent widget
- Fix: The manual location input for weather in the settings page works again, and no longer depends on Google to work
- Change: Replaced OpenWeatherMap weather data provider with OpenMeteo, which should result in higher accuracy and also the ability to get cool new data such as the previously-mentioned UV Index
- Change: Removed WeatherUnderground as a provider option, since it is no longer possible to create API keys for it
- Change: Default theme on black & white watches is now higher contrast
- Change: Weather widgets are used by default because that's what everyone used anyway
Fix for weather forecast
Rehost preferences page.

v7.1
* Oops left in a debug line that broke the config page. Fixed now.

Version 7.0 ("The Apocalypse Update")
	• Support for Time 2, so that when you pay $2000 for a prototype Time 2 on Ebay you'll be able to run TimeStyle on it
	• Added option to hide the Bluetooth disconnection icon, for when the Pebble app is but a distant memory
		○ (Thanks to plarus on GitHub for this contribution!)
	• Fixed visual glitch when LECO is selected and leading zero is hidden
	• Added the Hebrew language (language pack required) so that you'll be able to converse with the four horsemen of the apocalypse

v6.11
 - Vibration settings now respect watch quiet time setting

v6.10
 • Removed sleep function temporarily, until Pebble gets their act together and fixes the sleep bug
 • Add Korean language
 • Fixes that allow building on latest SDK

v6.9:
 	• New language option: 日本語 (Japanese, requires language pack)
	• New sidebar widget: heart rate monitor (for Pebble 2 only)
	• Improved LECO font metrics to better match "classic" appearance
	• Fixed a bug where antialiasing would fail to re-enable when changing fonts
	• Fixed a bug where certain combinations of widgets would overlap in Quick View mode

v6.8
 - Fixed an issue where the center widget wouldn't display if large fonts were enabled

v6.7
* Slight fix for off-center time on round watches

v6.6
- At last! Timeline Peek support!
- Improved font metrics for round watches
- Sidebar now defaults to grey on black and white watches
- Menu icon no longer has white corners on black and white watches

v6.5 "The calm before the storm"
- Preliminary support for the Pebble 2
- Added Gallacian language

v6.4
 * Fixed issue from 6.3 update that broke GPS weather

v6.3
 * Fixed issue where Weather Underground wouldn't work for certain locations

v6.2
 - Fixed an issue where only "day" weather icons were shown if Weather Underground was used

v6.1
 - Fix for potential issue where weather updates could become erroneously disabled

• New! Alternative weather data source
		○ Want more accurate weather data? Now you can choose Weather Underground, as long as you provide an API key!
	• Fixed a bug where OWM forecasts often had the same high and low temperature
	• Hourly vibe is now a double pulse, to distinguish it from notifications
	• Battery now shows "5%" instead of "0%" when at lowest level, to match official battery meter appearance
	• Percent sign now shows to the left of the number when language is set to Turkish
Month of "May" now fits slightly better in the sidebar

v5.13
 - Fix for an issue where the weather failed to update (thanks, IguanaBen!)

v5.12
 - Restored weather forecast functionality via dark magickry

v5.11:
	• EMERGENCY WEATHER FIX: switched to OpenWeatherMap since Yahoo is finally dead for real
		○ Note: The weather forecast widget has been temporarily removed. It will return, in some form, in the future (OWM doesn't offer daily forecasts)
	• New default widgets since weather is evil
		○ Health on Time-series watches
		○ Battery with percentage on BW watches
	• Watchface loads and exits much faster, thanks to optimizations from tsymbaliuk!
	• Automatic battery indication threshold lowered to 10%
	• Health widget now respects global unit setting
New language: Welsh

v5.10 - now with blatant disregard for decimal numbering systems
 - Ukranian language option (contributed by tsymbaliuk!)
 - Potential fix: parts of the sidebar should no longer disappear on round watches after receiving notifications (thanks to ygalanter for the code)
 - Potential fix: weather forecast icon should no longer disappear on BW pebbles
 - Day and month names no longer bump up against the edges of the sidebars on round watches

v5.9
 - Fixed issue where step distances between 100m and 999m didn't show up
 - Added new user-contributed themes

v5.8
 - Health now uses small font when showing distance above 10 kilometers
 - Battery levels less than 20% now display properly on BW watches w/ black sidebar

applications.description:
Digital. Readable. Completely customizable.

New for 2025 -- UV Index widget! Do you need to wear sunscreen today? Now you can find out!

The Timeline handles the past and the future—let TimeStyle handle your present.

• Time you can see. Even in the dark.
With more than 80% of the display devoted to the time and 6 font options, TimeStyle lets you read the time in even the most adverse conditions.

• Matches today's wardrobe. And tomorrow's.
With thousands of color scheme possibilities, you'll always be color coordinated.

• The information you care about, and none that you don't.
TimeStyle features a wide variety of different widgets, including step counts, sleep times, weather, the week number, seconds, the time in another time zone, the battery level, Swatch™ Internet Time, and more!

• Know your status.
TimeStyle automatically displays notifications when the battery is low or when your phone disconnects.

• Speaks your language: With 35 languages, TimeStyle supports more languages than ANY other watchface. Choose between English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Dutch, Turkish, Czech, Slovak, Portuguese, Greek, Swedish, Polish, Romanian, Vietnamese, Catalan, Norwegian, Russian, Estonian, Basque, Finnish, Danish, Lithuanian, Slovenian, Hungarian, Croatian, Serbian, Irish, Latvian, Chinese, Japanese, Indonesian, Ukrainian, Welsh, and Gallacian! (Your language missing? Contact me and I'll add it!)

latest_release.release_notes:
Release Notes:
v7.7 ("Forgotten Memories of Another Time")
- Fix: Alternate time zone widget no longer resets back to GMT after exiting watchface
- Fix: Should be less likely to delete all your settings during upgrades in the future
- Improvement: Alternate time zone settings page now provides a reminder about the potential impact of daylight savings time

applications.title: TimeStyle

applications.author: fin

changelog.release_notes: Fixed error where it would use the 24 hour time format while displaying the AM and PM symbols
Might have bug... fix later

applications.description: This watch face is inspired by the P.O-K.O! by teenage engineering as part of their pocket operator series. This design features the clock present on the pocket operator along with a sleepy man (u-uhm... I think that's what it is) and a bar to show battery level like the bar that appears when using the knobs on the pocket operator. I am not at all affiliated with teenage engineering.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed error where it would use the 24 hour time format while displaying the AM and PM symbols

applications.title: P.O-K.O!

applications.author: mgerb

changelog.release_notes:
New Features

- Time, date, day of week
- Weather (Open-Meteo)
  - Text description
  - Weather icons (day/night)
- Temperature (°F/°C)
- Steps
- Battery level
  - Percentage
  - Icon
- Bluetooth status (connected/disconnected)
- Vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect
- Vibrate on the hour
- UTC time
- Sunrise/sunset
  - Displays the next upcoming sunrise/sunset times.
    For example, if the current time is a few minutes
    past sunset, then the sunset time displayed will
    be for the following day.
- Moon phase

applications.description:
The watchface resembles the Yes Watch and has features like sun rise / sun set, moon rise / moon set, moon phase, 24 h hand, and, of course, the time.
The computations are done on the phone in case of no online connection.

You instantly see how much daylight is left, when the moon will rise and the current moon phase.

In case you need multiple time locations and other features of the original Yes Watch, have a look at https://yeswatch.com/

latest_release.release_notes: First version

applications.description:
Minimalin Again is a fully customizable watchface that blends analog and digital for a simple, modern and elegant look, based on the original Minimalin watchface and the Minimalin Reborn fork.

* Fully configurable colors
* Weather conditions and temperature
* Date display
* Steps from Pebble Health
* Low battery icon
* Bluetooth disconnected icon (pick your favorite)
* Quiet Time support
* Timeline Quick View support
* Rainbow hand!

Designed by @AlessioLaiso. Developed by @groyoh.

Updated fork based on the original Minimalin watchface from GringerApps and the Minimalin Reborn fork by vorsk.
